issue.title: [CF 1654] Game fps goes very low with TMW enabled
issue.body:
My PC works fine in uldir but fps can go very low in battle of dazaralor.

Tried everything and i found out that if i just simply turn TMW disabled fps goes back higher.

Dont know why but some people have the same problem and some dont.

How can i fix this issue?


> Posted by CurseForge user Ymym830 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1654 | Raw

comments.body:
You can increase update interval only for TMW itself, your issue with conditions which you use in tmw, if you use for example buff/debuff to query then it will has higher and higher cpu load depend on amount spells.


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos

Thanks to cordankosã€‚Your post is very helpful and it must be the issue. I will try it out and see how it works. And any suggestion on how much update interval is ressonable? It was 0.05 sec as default and i am trying it at 0.3 sec.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ymym830

You may find 0.3 seconds to be a little slow - that's just over 3 updates per second, so you'll definitely notice that icons don't update right away. But yes, this is the main way you can reduce the CPU usage of TMW, short of reducing the number of icons you use.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
